IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.desc_1: Hello, this page was made in a hurry to test so it has not been refined yet, will gradually add more, please be understanding!.
IndexPage.desc_2: All HP ATK DEF is % not flat at all.
IndexPage.desc_3: I currently do not have time to input the Base char and Lightcone stats data, will gradually add this section!.
IndexPage.desc_4: All data will be saved on your machine, may be lost due to your activities and I do not save the data anywhere else!.
IndexPage.desc_41: Javascipt and localStorage Api must been enable to page work
IndexPage.desc_5: Follow: Select Character -> Add stats, select Relics, Lightcone, Eidolon -> Generate code -> Replace whole old code
IndexPage.desc_6: Navigate to the file path below:
IndexPage.desc_7: Find the file named: BattleReqGroup.cs, open it with Notepad
IndexPage.desc_9: Translate Vietnamese to English by ClaudeAI

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

Error.title: Something went wrong!

We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
